column5: One block to the beach! This turn of the century Victorian with high ceilings, ambiance, history and warmth has unobstructed views of The Gulf! Walking distance to restaurants, family-friendly activities, nightlife and The Pleasure Pier. Itâ€™s also just a short drive or bike ride to several historical sites and downtown. A great place for couples, solo adventurers, families with older children, small groups and business travelers.
